title: Googleâ€™s affordable Pixel 6a is officially coming to India later this year
content:
Pixel fans in India rejoice! The newly announced Pixel 6a is officially coming here, marking the return of Google’s Pixel line to the Indian smartphone market after nearly a two-year hiatus. There have been rumors in the past weeks that Google might bring the Pixel 6a to India, and that has indeed turned out to

The post Google’s affordable Pixel 6a is officially coming to India later this year appeared first on XDA.
description: Google has confirmed the Pixel 6a is coming to the Indian market later this year. There's no word on pricing or exact launch date yet.
